---
title: "Lecture 1: Introduction to MCCM"
---

Here some examples on how to create a plot in `ggplot`:

```{r chunk_no_1, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

cars %>%
  filter(speed > 4) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = speed, y = dist), color = 'red') +
  theme_classic()
```
